item.title: CVE-2023-0882|2024-08-02T05:24:34.698Z -- kron%20tech -- single%20connect
item.description: Improper Input Validation, Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Kron Tech Single Connect on Windows allows Privilege Abuse.Â This issue affects Single Connect: 2.16.
